snippet: David H. Hoffmann is chief and chairman of DHR International, an executive search firm. After a turbulent flight to Nashville to meet a job candidate, Mr. Hoffmann was met by a multifaceted executive.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features DHR International chief executive and chairman David H Hoffmann discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: David H. Hoffmann is chief and chairman of DHR International, an executive search firm. After a turbulent flight to Nashville to meet a job candidate, Mr. Hoffmann was met by a multifaceted executive.

headline.seo: A Headhunter Finds a Prospect Who Puts Himself Out There
headline.main: An Executive Candidate Who Puts Himself Out There
headline.print_headline: An Executive Candidate Who Puts Himself Out There
